content: {"name": "COMMUNITY FOOD CENTER \u2013 STONE MOUNTAIN", "alternate_name": "", "description": "To make an appointment to get food:  Text FOOD to 678-884-4564 or call 478-394-4547.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.acfb.org/community-food-center/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1979 Parker Court", "address_2": null, "city": "Stone Mountain", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30087", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8265496, "longitude": -84.1068282}, "phones": [{"number": "(478) 394-4547", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "23:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}]}
